title: Account security
body: Is there anyway to make it so support will tie your email to the account or leave a note so only the person with access to that email can request a change

replies.body:
I'd suggest that you go to your account management settings (on this site) and make sure your email address is verified.  This will be the best way to make sure that the support team know who is the account owner.

Cheers
